name: Hues
description:
Sprites like color blocks so move them there. The faster the better.
Color blocks can be destroyed with the mouse. Use this combination to solve the very fun very interesting levels.
Features
3 characters with unique limitations you control using the arrow keys to move based on physics.
The ball rolls freely.
The hex rolls but not so easily.
The box cannot roll.
The mouse allows you to destroy the blocks that must be removed to solve the puzzles.
The color blocks disintegrate into a nice satisfying dust by either clicking on them or a nice smooth slice motion.
The color blocks and even the characters can be attached by joints that can rotate by motors.
Levels can have springs and buoyancy from the water.
There is a bonus count down to allow speed runners to compete.
Levels are highly replayable.
